price: dobrotom i blagodati Allahovom. – A Allah sve zna i mudar je.
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعۡمَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faḍlan mina al-lahi waniʿ'matan wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
